name: Lightning Control
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Choose from two of the following effects. You can't target a creature or area twice with the same effect, but you can still choose the same effect twice otherwise.
* You pull a metal object in range that weighs no more than 5 pounds into your empty hand.
* You magnetize a metal object or surface such that any other metal object or surface in contact with the magnetized surface will remain in place until you or another creature deliberately moves either object or surface.
* You shock a creature in contact with you, dealing 1 lightning damage. If the creature is grappling you, you can immediately choose to break the grapple as part of this spell.
* A mostly harmless but flashy spark of lightning extends from your fingertip to target point within range, and remains for up to 6 seconds. You can optionally choose to deal 1 lightning damage to anything it is touching at the start of your next turn.
* You harmlessly zap a creature and cover their face in soot.
